TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IWithLoadBalancingRule

Docs.summary: The stage of the load balancer update allowing to add, remove or modify load balancing rules.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Microsoft.Azure.Management.Network.Fluent.LoadBalancingRule.UpdateDefinition.IBlank`1<class Microsoft.Azure.Management.Network.Fluent.LoadBalancer.Update.IUpdate> DefineLoadBalancingRule(string name) cil managed

Docs.param: The name of the load balancing rule.
Docs.summary: Begins the definition of a new load balancing rule to add to the load balancer. The definition must be completed with a call to LoadBalancerTcpProbe.DefinitionStages.WithAttach.attach().
Docs.return: The first stage of the new load balancing rule definition.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Microsoft.Azure.Management.Network.Fluent.LoadBalancingRule.Update.IUpdate UpdateLoadBalancingRule(string name) cil managed

Docs.param: The name of the load balancing rule to update.
Docs.summary: Begins the description of an update to an existing load balancing rule on this load balancer.
Docs.return: The first stage of the load balancing rule update.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Microsoft.Azure.Management.Network.Fluent.LoadBalancer.Update.IUpdate WithLoadBalancingRule(int32 port, class Microsoft.Azure.Management.Network.Fluent.Models.TransportProtocol protocol) cil managed

Docs.param: The port number on the front and back end for the network traffic to be load balanced on.
Docs.summary: Adds a load balancing rule for the specified port and protocol. The new rule will be created under the name "default".
Docs.return: The next stage of the definition.

MemberSignature.Value: public Microsoft.Azure.Management.Network.Fluent.LoadBalancer.Update.IUpdate WithLoadBalancingRule (int frontendPort, Microsoft.Azure.Management.Network.Fluent.Models.TransportProtocol protocol, int backendPort);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Microsoft.Azure.Management.Network.Fluent.LoadBalancer.Update.IUpdate WithLoadBalancingRule(int32 frontendPort, class Microsoft.Azure.Management.Network.Fluent.Models.TransportProtocol protocol, int32 backendPort) cil managed

Docs.param: The port number on the front end to accept incoming traffic on.
The port number on the back end to send load balanced traffic to.
Docs.summary: Adds a load balancing rule between the specified front end and back end ports and protocol. The new rule will be created under the name "default".
Docs.return: The next stage of the definition.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Microsoft.Azure.Management.Network.Fluent.LoadBalancer.Update.IUpdate WithoutLoadBalancingRule(string name) cil managed

Docs.param: The name of the load balancing rule to remove.
Docs.summary: Removes the specified load balancing rule from the load balancer, if present.
Docs.return: The next stage of the update.
